sen.j: 正親町三条 実彦（おおぎまちさんじょう さねひこ、元禄16年10月30日 (旧暦)（1703年12月8日） - 享保10年8月28日 (旧暦)（1725年10月4日）は、江戸時代中期の廷臣。
sen.e: Sanehiko OGIMACHISANJO (December 8, 1703 - October 4, 1725) was a retainer of the Imperical Court in the middle Edo period.
Sanehiko OGIMACHISANJO (December 8, 1703 - October 4, 1725) was a retainer of the Imperical Court in the middle Edo period.
Sanehiko OGIMACHISANJO (December 8, 1703 - October 4, 1725) was a retainer of the Imperical Court in the middle Edo period.

sen.j: 父は権大納言滋野井公澄。
sen.e: His father was Kinzumi SHIGENOI, Dainagon (chief councilor of state).
His father was Kinzumi SHIGENOI, Gon Dainagon (a provisional chief councilor of state).
sen.cmt: ウィキに合わせて、原文を以下のように修正し、訳文も修正しました。大納言→権大納言
sen.e: His father was Kinzumi SHIGENOI, Gon Dainagon (a provisional chief councilor of state).

sen.j: 母は権大納言甘露寺方長の娘。
sen.e: His mother was a daughter of 方長 KANROJI, Dainagon (a chief councillor of state).
His mother was a daughter of 方長 KANROJI, Gon Dainagon.
sen.cmt: ウィキに合わせて、原文を以下のように修正し、訳文も修正しました。大納言→権大納言
sen.e: His mother was a daughter of 方長 KANROJI, Gon Dainagon.

sen.j: 子に権大納言正親町三条公積がいる。
sen.e: His son was Kintsumu OGIMACHISANJO, Dainagon (chief councilor of state).
His son was Kintsumu OGIMACHISANJO, Gon Dainagon.
sen.cmt: ウィキに合わせて、原文を以下のように修正し、訳文も修正しました。大納言→権大納言
sen.e: His son was Kintsumu OGIMACHISANJO, Gon Dainagon.

sen.j: 中御門天皇（114代）時代の廷臣で、公卿まであと一歩という正四位下左近衛中将まで昇進したが、23歳の若さで卒去する。
sen.e: He was a retainer of the Imperial Court during the time of Emperor Nakamikado (114th) and was promoted to Shoshiinoge Konoefu (a government official at the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards in the Senior Fourth Rank) and almost ranked with kugyo (a Court noble), however, he died young at the age of 23.

He was a retainer of the Imperial Court during the time of Emperor Nakamikado (114th) and was promoted to Shoshiinoge Sakone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards in the Senior Fourth Rank) and almost ranked with kugyo (a Court noble), however, he died young at the age of 23.
sen.cmt: ウィキに合わせて、原文を以下のように修正し、訳文も修正しました。近衛府→左近衛中将
sen.e: He was a retainer of the Imperial Court during the time of Emperor Nakamikado (114th) and was promoted to Shoshiinoge Sakone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards in the Senior Fourth Rank) and almost ranked with kugyo (a Court noble), however, he died young at the age of 23.
